query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cms_modules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  pathId INT NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  titleFr VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  descriptionFr TEXT,
  badgeUrl TEXT,
  quizPassingScore INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 80,
  sortOrder INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  isPublished BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cms_lessons (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  moduleId INT NOT NULL,
  lessonNumber VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  titleFr VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  duration VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '50 min',
  xpReward INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 100,
  sortOrder INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  isPublished BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cms_lesson_slots (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  lessonId INT NOT NULL,
  slotType ENUM('hook','video','strategy','written','oral','quiz','coaching') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  titleFr VARCHAR(256),
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  contentFr TEXT,
  sortOrder INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cms_quizzes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  lessonId INT,
  moduleId INT,
  title VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  titleFr VARCHAR(256),
  quizType ENUM('formative','summative','final_exam','placement') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'formative',
  passingScore INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 80,
  timeLimitMinutes INT,
  isPublished BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  sortOrder INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cms_quiz_questions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  quizId INT NOT NULL,
  questionType ENUM('multiple_choice','fill_in_blank','true_false','matching','ordering') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'multiple_choice',
  question TEXT NOT NULL,
  questionFr TEXT,
  options JSON,
  optionsFr JSON,
  correctAnswer TEXT NOT NULL,
  correctAnswerFr TEXT,
  feedback TEXT,
  feedbackFr TEXT,
  points INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  sortOrder INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cms_media_assets (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  filename VARCHAR(512) NOT NULL,
  fileUrl TEXT NOT NULL,
  fileKey VARCHAR(512) NOT NULL,
  mimeType VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
  fileSizeBytes INT,
  altText VARCHAR(512),
  altTextFr VARCHAR(512),
  category ENUM('cover','badge','lesson_image','audio','video','document','other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'other',
  uploadedBy INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
